website_summaries.verdict: Mixed reviews. Some adore them, some say the boots fell apart too quickly for the price. The only thing they agree upon is that Basel is the cutest bootie from Lucky this season.
pros: Side zip closure with with pull tab at back
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: Color does not hold up well when exposed to rain
Some customers say they fall apart quickly

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Shoe looks trashed after less than 2 months of wear. Heel area had a faux stacked look-- actually just covered in paper! The paper is all torn and peeling, and the material underneath is very unattractive. These are now basically junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best and Worst Boot: Does Not Handle Rain Well
customer_reviews.text: I am so torn about these boots. The fit is awesome and they are super comfortable, so I naturally fell in love with them right away. But after one rain storm, they weathered terribly. The color disappeared at the point where my pants hit the boot and the heel covering is peeling off. I'm so sad! I expected a much longer life out of these leather boots!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my boots today! Highly disappointed. Boots have markings all over them. Bottom of the soles are worn. The are definitely used knock offs. I’ve seen, felt and even tried on an authentic pair of Lucky Brand boots. These are definitely not authentic. I would return them but as someone reviewed before, they won’t return them because they said they were worn. Well of course! You sold me them USED! 😡
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size larger than your usual size
customer_reviews.text: These boots cause comments and compliments whenever I wear them. Lucky Brand shoes and boots run a little short so I knew to order a half size up. The colors are pretty close to what I’m shown online and they look good with jeans. They are super comfortable and add a lot of style to any outfit. Plus, I got them at a great price. I will shop for Lucky Brand on Amazon for other styles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best boots I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these shoes, but they require a lot of work. After only a day at the office they look scuffed and worn (but not the good kind). Also, I typically buy Born shoes, and these are not nearly as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Knapton

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I would expect from Lucky. Very high quality construction and nice leather. Some other reviewers said they are narrow or run small. Not so. They're real leather, and they need to be broken in for a day or so. I wore them all day and my feet were totally fine, and by the end of the day the leather had softened. I also saw some who complained about them getting ruined in the rain. Well, don't wear your leather boots in the rain. Treat them with oil to protect them and keep them looking new! They will last you a long time!
customer_reviews.author: avidreader89

customer_reviews.title: Perfect booties
customer_reviews.text: My favorite booties! Comfortable and light. I sprayed these with a suede protector to help with rainy days. Photos are taken after a year of lots of wear!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hedman

customer_reviews.title: Don't hold up well at all
customer_reviews.text: These boots are really cute and look great but they have not held up well at all. After about 2 weeks of normal (and not daily) wear (errand running, dropping kids at school) the color has worn off the heel area of the boot. I'm disappointed since these weren't the cheap. A few weeks in and these look like an old beat up pair of shoes
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: What Happened???
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. I bought my first set at a department store and noticed right away, the shoes run small. I bought a half size larger and they have been so comfortable I had to get another pair. So I ordered the Camo style and couldn't wait till they got here. As soon as I put my foot in, I knew there was a serious problem. The front half of the boot was so tight and the back half was so loose. I have narrow and thin feet but my heel kept slipping. So I ordered another set while returning this set and hope the incoming set is better. What happened to quality control?
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Cain

customer_reviews.title: Heel peeling apart
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have taken more heed to the other review here. After 6 months of light to moderate wear the heels on these boots is peeling off. I thought this was a reputable brand and I paid good money for these booties, I expected for them to last for years, not a couple months. Aside from that issue, these were cute booties that I got lots of compliments on, just wish they were still cute instead of falling apart!
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Scholze

customer_reviews.title: Good boot
customer_reviews.text: Product fit well. I bought the black in 6.5. The leather has a nice soft buttery feel. I conditioned them with a leather polish to add more protection to the leather. The heel is the perfect height to be femine but comfortable for walking and all day wear. Will update in a few months on how well they wear. The ankle opening is a nice size too ... Not to large so I doesn't create an awkward gap but just enough. If a larger ankle opening is need I would recommend the lucky Breeha boot.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper them previous year styles
customer_reviews.text: I thought that this might have been a knock off when it arrived, but I compared it to the version available in store (Lucky Brand store at Ala Moana) and it is exactly the same. The quality is cheaper than previous years. The sole does not have support (super cheap plastic) and discolors very quickly. I used a sharpie to touch it up. Overall not really worth the price. Style is great, five stars, but quality, durability, and comfort are 1 star. Also, make sure you waterproof the bottom seam, since it does not come with sealed toe seams.
customer_reviews.author: lisan

customer_reviews.title: Cutest boot, but not the most comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my eye on these boots for a year or more now. They are, in my mind, the perfect toffee color and style. The comfort level is not the highest though. They are very flat and hard on the bottom and my bunions do not love wearing them all day. I think the leather will stretch and they will soon fit me better in width. If you want more comfort in the bottom, I suggest going up half a size and adding inserts. I thought about returning and doing this, but couldn't wait to wear them. They are super cute and what I've been wanting, but I know I don't want to walk all day in them!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn G.

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great! I am very picky about finding a comfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! I am very picky about finding a comfortable shoe that also looks nice (very difficult to accomplish!) but these are a good candidate. They were true to size but slipped off my heel a bit when walking. After adding heel snugs in the back of the shoe, they now fit perfectly. I would be careful, however, if you have a wide foot. The toe area is a bit snug even for me with very narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: I wore these pretty much every day while we were traveling in Europe
customer_reviews.text: I wore these pretty much every day while we were traveling in Europe, and we walked miles and miles every day. These were the only shoes I took on our trip that never caused any pain. I absolutely love these shoes. They are incredibly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: kvkysar

customer_reviews.title: wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I tried on the color "Brindle" in the Lucky store and took a picture of the box to make sure I had the right color. Then I ordered the same color and style on this website, but this boot is much darker. The Basel Boot in Brindle sold at the Lucky store is a very light beige not a brown. If you look on the Lucky website also you can see that the color shown here is not at all like the Brindle sold by the real Lucky. I am wondering if these are not really lucky brand boots because the color is completely wrong. I am going to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Shulman

customer_reviews.title: If you are questioning this bootie, you are not looking at it hard enough.  But, size up!
customer_reviews.text: Always remember with lucky brand, they run about a 1/2 size small. However, worthy of the inconvenience. After upsizing, these are super comfortable and really a great, classic staple bootie. Have been working these out for months now and they still bring a big smile to my face.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: cute but are junk... don't buy
customer_reviews.text: These boots are comfortable but after less than 3 weeks of wearing them they are junk... they look horrible and not worth the money. If i could return them I would. They were not cheep and i expected them to last longer than a few weeks. I received them on December 1st and today is December 31st and i probably wore them a total of 20 days to work. I sit at my desk as an IT professional so it isn't like i am rough on my shoes. They are cute and i wish them wore better. i would submit photos but all the other reviews look as bad as mine
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: Too Wide And Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I researched and researched walking boots before I decided to order these. I am disappointed because they are quite roomy (even tho I meticulously followed the size chart) and the arch support is awkward. I would not be able to go anywhere without discomfort if I wore these shoes. All the reviews were so positive, so this was a surprise to me. I wear a size 9 and have a narrow foot. For the money, this is a no-go for me. They are being returned.
customer_reviews.author: zesty

customer_reviews.title: Slight scuffy but I like rustic
customer_reviews.text: I admit I was afraid to buy these boots based on some reviews but I've worn these now for 4 months now regularly. -They scuff if your not careful but I think boot oil can help with that. -No issues with the heel coming loose even when my silly butt walks on my heels jokingly at work -Theyre great for business casual attire with a little southern charm. -I do enjoy the arch because my feet are arch themselves and the heel isn't high enough where you're afraid to bust ass Like it but if you don't like the lil scuffy look. IDK if these are for you sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: More support on the bottom of the foot than I am used to
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy Amazon had these because the Lucky website did not. One of my coworkers had them and I just had to copy her! These are super nice. I would definitely recommend getting a suede spray or something to make sure that they stay nice. The sole did start rubbing off the first time I wore them exposing some of the rubber beneath, but no big deal. I had a hard time figuring out things to wear with them. The sole inside is much more padded than I was used to, so initially they felt weird, but I really liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - trust the customer pictures!  Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even try these boots on so I cannot speak to the fit. The quality of the boots is so visibly poor that I immediately boxed them for return. I read the negative customer reviews and looked at the customer pictures but many of them were from years ago. I hoped the manufacturer had since improved the quality of the boots, but sadly they haven't. The stacked heel is fake and covered in a paper-like material. The leather is of such poor quality that it will scuff and and even gouge at the slightest friction, like driving a car or bumping your desk. It makes me wonder if they are real leather. Don't waste your money on these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lee

customer_reviews.title: I had purchased the brown Lucky Basel Booties at Macy’s and loved the fit
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with these! I had purchased the brown Lucky Basel Booties at Macy’s and loved the fit. I was bummed when I couldn’t find the black ones and immediately looked on Amazon. My brown ones are still in tip top shape after 2 years. These black ones didn’t even make it through the winter. The leather started peeling off in layers after only a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: gongfy

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey to wear many times--beware of water
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of these boots and they were comfortable enough to wear for more than 7 hours, 2 days in a row. However, do NOT get them wet! A couple drops of water fell on these and it STAINED the fabric. If there's some secret to what you use on suede on erase water marks then I haven't found it. Cute and functionally comfortable, but don't expect to wear them many times before water ruins them.
customer_reviews.author: McQ

customer_reviews.title: normally i am size 6
customer_reviews.text: i love this shover confortable ,normally i use size 6 but Lucky brand run small so i buy half size more 6 .5 and fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: celeste

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t dodge the bad heal like I’d hoped
customer_reviews.text: I wear these boots once a week at least. I had hoped mine wouldn’t have that crappy heal but, yep, after a few wears the sticker that makes the heal look like stacked wood starting coming off. Mostly on my right foot and I suspect it’s from driving. A brown sharpie and a creative touch fixed it up but it’s temporary at best. The boot has a feel like it could be made for a higher heal....like the arch is higher. I can’t figure it out. They aren’t uncomfortable so I keep wearing them. The leather uppers are in good shape still after 5 wears.
customer_reviews.author: S. Parks

customer_reviews.title: The perfect ankle boot!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots!! They’re really comfortable. I work 12hr shifts in a hospital and these felt great all day. I bought 2 more pair after wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: Angie R

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, started falling apart after just a couple months
customer_reviews.text: Did you read all those reviews saying the shoes would fall apart? We did too but still pressed buy anyways. Oops! It says they are 100% leather but then why is the material flaking in random places; maybe it's 90% leather and 10% flake? Apparently we are too late to return. Bought them for fancier occasions but now they're only good for around the house. Wasted over $90 (including tax), you too could be writing this review in just a couple months!
customer_reviews.author: noah

customer_reviews.title: Defects and scratched
customer_reviews.text: Defects and scratched leather. Also, looks like the heel has just a glued on trim around it and one edge was already coming up. Returned and ordered a new pair and they look much better. Hoping they hold up. Going to put a protectant, as other reviews have said that it helps. When I went to buy them the second time they were on sale so that was a plus. I normally wear a 7.5 but always get an 8 in boots. The 8 fit perfect, both zippers on each side of each shoe works so that’s nice. Feel comfy enough. Smells like real leather too. Shoe box states 8M. Will write a separate review for second pair.
customer_reviews.author: AlinaRN

customer_reviews.title: Run true to size
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I didn't listen to the reviews that said these boots ran narrow or small. I ordered my normal size and they fit fine. I really like the color, a rich green instead of the brownish green most olive shoes seem to be . They arrived on time and they were in a Lucky Shoe box but there was none of the usual tissue paper and cardboard that usually accompanies new boots. This made me wonder if they were used or returned, not that they looked used but there was a slight crease on one toe. I do like these boots but gave 4 stars because they are not the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars because they scratch easier than I can really say. It's ridiculous. I paid out for more expensive boots hoping they would last longer - years. Second wear, scratches to leather. Third wear, color coming off the outer sole and heel. So disappointed because they are cute and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Overall quality and what to expect
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that, as they are made of real leather, they conform to your foot after you wear them. I feel like the heel and ankle part are a slight bit loose, though it doesn’t bother me. The toe and front foot area is just right. I was slightly disappointed when, after I put leather conditioner/polish on them, they darkened up from their original color, but I suppose that is to be expected. I like the fact that they have zippers that zip up and down on either side of each boot. I also very much like the insole, it is excellent. I wear them a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly as pictured. Comfortable and cute. The perfect bootie.
customer_reviews.text: The black bootie looks exactly as pictured. It is a perfectly proportioned boot. I think it is perfect! I've worn them now in sleet and light rain & snow and had no slips and nothing happened to the leather. There was no breaking in period. I am a size 7..5 but bought an 8 (as usual) for room for thick socks. I would buy in more colors (when they go on sale) currently the brown is $99. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: LINDA

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL the sizing is completely different in this color
customer_reviews.text: I have this exact pair of shoes in black and they are super comfortable with plenty of room and great for walking. These arrived today and they are labeled as the exact same size as my black pair but are AT LEAST a half size smaller if not more. They are extremely tight even after walking around in my house with a thick pair of socks to try and stretch the leather. Disappointed:(
customer_reviews.author: hannahsmom32808

customer_reviews.title: Decent boat.
customer_reviews.text: The boots are comfortable. They are slightly larger in size than another pair that I have in a different color. I believe that is due to the type of leather. They are holding up and looking fine. Because they have stretched a bit, my feet slip in and out of them easier than the other ones I have. The leather is somewhat shiny, and I fear that it sometimes looks like vinyl. Overall, I am happy with the boot.
customer_reviews.author: Darci B.

customer_reviews.title: My teacher feet love these!
customer_reviews.text: I like LuckyBrand boots. They fit me well. I am a teacher on my feet all day. These are a staple to my wardrobe. Comfy- wore them all day straight if of the box and no blisters. I wear a 8.5 in Brooks but an 8 in these. If I size up they slide. I wear medium wool socks and they are perfect. The soles are a little slick but the heels are not high and they grip better. Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Regibus

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I have recieved so many compliments on these boots, and they're comfortable too! The fit is spot, the leather incredibly buttery, and the zippers on both sides work! These have become my go to shoes, you can dress them up or down and wear them for 12+ with no issues! I've been wearing these nearly everyday for almost 3 months so they have broken in without breaking down or giving me any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect style!
customer_reviews.text: I love these for the style. If I'm going to be walking miles at work, these aren't the best option though. For adorable ankle booties, they're quite comfortable. They run a little large. In most sneakers, I wear a 10 but other shoe styles, a 9.5 is best. I bought a 9.5 in these (after returning the 10) and the fit is perfect. They stretch a little after use so buy them with a good fit, knowing they will loosen slightly.
customer_reviews.author: J. D.

customer_reviews.title: Not the same boot as in stores
customer_reviews.text: Beware... This is not the same boot of its kind in the stores. I didn't even try it on once I got it I could tell the leather was nothing like the one I tried on in Macys. The heel was also much cheaper material.. the fake wood grain that peels off. I thought I found a deal on these boots but somebody is plunge a fast one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Moore

customer_reviews.title: They are super tight in the toes
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised so many people are willing to live with the pain waiting to stretch these out. They are super tight in the toes, slip a little in the back, and I don't want to get a blister from them. I love the color, the style, everything except the fit. I'm going to send these back, not sure if I should try a different size or keep looking for a boot that fits well. So I guess ordering up a size might help.....hard to tell without being able to try them on.......these really are uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: right shoes, wrong size
customer_reviews.text: The shoes arrived before I expected an I was so happy to see them. I tried them on and they were too big. I had ordered the 9M and received a pair of 9W. I had to return them and was very disappointed, especially when i could no longer order them in 9M. Luckily I found them on another site in the right size and at a cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: Leaner

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable boot, received scratched pair
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of these boots purchased from other retailers and I have had them for several years and they have held up very well for how hard I am on them. I do not baby these boots, just condition the leather every once in a while. I received this new pair in toffee today ( a replacement for my pair I had for about 6 yrs) and it had several scratches right out of the box. I am disappointed because I should be the one to wear them/scratch them. I hope amazon will remedy this for me.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine D

customer_reviews.title: Weird black smudges
customer_reviews.text: They came packaged nice and neat, but had smudges and scratches that looked like black boot polish. 😭 They look like boot polish was used to darken the heels and toes which is common and would have been fine... but whoever did not do it carefully AT ALL. I just returned my order for a refund instead of a replacement because I was worried the replacement would have the same problem...
customer_reviews.author: Amber branscum

customer_reviews.title: Ill-Fitting, Poorly Made Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if the photos convey how poorly made these boots are. There is no arch support. The leather is floppy around what should be some kind of construction or contour around the arch. They look good until you put them on and discover what a disaster they are. The fit is okay, but the hard toe painfully folds into my foot when I walk. I've tried them with heavy socks, I've tried them with stockings, I've tried them with arch supports and nothing works. I missed the deadline to return them and my $129.95 is a total waste.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Souder

customer_reviews.title: Nice style
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 7 (my usual size) and had to go up to the 7.5. They aren't the most comfortable boot, but I like the style of them and the color goes with pretty much anything. I do agree with the other reviewers that say they seem to wear quickly. I have worn them a handful of times and they already have deep creases worked into the leather. I don't know that they will last more than one season, which is disappointing because even though Amazon is priced lower than other retailers, they still are a little too expensive for a one season boot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good walking boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for an upcoming vacation. I wore them all around the city to break them in and put more than 80 miles on them - and they've held up great so far. I even wore them for biking. Comfortable to walk in, and I don't have to worry about them. The best part is after a long hard day, they zipper off so easily!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Lucky Brand; Lucky Me!!!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit, quiet bottoms, beautiful leather design and color. More than happy with this purchase PLUS saved $40 off the mall store price (that didn't have my size).
customer_reviews.author: Catherine P.

customer_reviews.title: Both good-looking and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots! They're both good-looking and comfortable. The two side zippers are genius, making it so much easier to put the boots on and off. And when my daughter was visiting, she wore them everywhere and now wants her own pair, lol. #momstyle Just be aware the boots run small--I had to return the size 8 for a size 8.5, and I *always* wear a size 7.5-8 shoe. But I was able to ship them back for free, so no worries.
customer_reviews.author: RM Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good boots-2 pair now
customer_reviews.text: They are a little narrow (my feet are sometimes slightly wide?) I got size 9.5 and they were fine lengthwise but a little narrow. It took a little while to break them in but I like them a lot. I wear them nearly every day so they are a little scuffed right now and I need to polish them up a bit. Love the color and they make my feet look smaller :) UPDATE: GOT ANOTHER PAIR- in black. They're awesome. Not narrow since I lost some weight (a lot of weight)... lol
customer_reviews.author: Posie

customer_reviews.title: Hey Amazon - these boots arrived an hour ago USED.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive these, then pretty saddened to see them arrive used. I've studied the images on Amazon, googled additional product shots to be sure and yep, these are absolutely in used condition. The boots were worn and scuffed up at some point in time, returned, shelved and later sent to my house like no big deal. Considering the nearly $90 price tag I'm a little disenchanted right now, but I have to size up anyway because they run a little small. My fingers are crossed the next pair arrive as shown and not like they've had a previous exciting life somewhere. Amazon usually rocks, I'm sure they'll follow through. I'll update when they do.
customer_reviews.author: MiaKai

customer_reviews.title: Didn't make a ton of noise when I walked and we're super comfy. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: These booties were my FAVE. Gorgeous with the softest leather ever. Didn't make a ton of noise when I walked and we're super comfy. Unfortunately, they run way small. I ended up selling mine and buying a full size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Megan C.

customer_reviews.title: Did not match the picture, but I believe it's an authentic Lucky Brand product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because they were supposed to be the black sole and black suede. They came as black leather with a lighter sole. How am I supposed to order the correct product if it doesn't match the picture? For what it's worth, I do think it's a genuine Lucky shoe. Just... the wrong shoe. Can I get the correct pair... is that even possible?
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Scuffs when arrived, but still nice boots
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the boots and they fit true to size! I was, however, a little disappointed with the condition they arrived in. There were lots of scuffs on both boots and could tell that one was a little worn near the ankle/top of the boot. The reason why I'm giving this 4 stars instead of 3 with these defects is that​ they were still $20 cheaper than anywhere else I could find them. I used some leather polishing spray that I had at home and cleaned them up, so now the scuffs aren't as noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. These are awesome boots! They fit true to size. They look amazing! The description says bright blue, so I almost didn't buy these, thinking they would be a garish cole. These are not bright blue. They are navy suede. Especially perfect with jeans. Not a bright color. There is a gold-colored zipper on each side of the boot. The heel is low. It's just an awesome look. Great deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Grammar Police

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves these booties. She has worn them ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these booties. She has worn them frequently. We live in NYC, so they've already seen a lot of mileage. She said she took the advice of other reviewers and treated them with some weather proofing balm before wearing them. She has not had any problems with discoloration.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: The shoes seem to be a nice leather however The color is not even close to ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes seem to be a nice leather however The color is not even close to a “brindle”. They are a medium brown. At first I thought they sent me the wrong color however the box does say brindle. I am hoping to buy a lighter color shoe polish to help lighten them. Only other complaint is the bottom of the shoe is very smooth and can be slippery on some floors. I wish it had better tred.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Boots are very comfortable and great for walking
customer_reviews.text: Boots are very comfortable and great for walking. They fit a little snug directly above the arch but I wear insoles for arch support. My only complaint is the zipper tabs bounce up and down when you walk and I don't like shoes that make a sound. I wear these boot with cuffed jeans or pants where the pant legs come to just above the boots, I work in a quiet office and I am self-conscious of these boots. I'm thinking of taking these boots to a shoes repair and having him put a stitch on the outer zipper to keep them closed and removing the zipper tab.
customer_reviews.author: OCHouseWife

customer_reviews.title: So far so good for the boots
customer_reviews.text: So far so good for the boots! I'm a 9.5 typically but usually order 10 if they're shoes where socks are required, and these fit well. They were a little tight initially but after a week of nonstop wear they've stretched out and are super comfortable. The bottom and little bit of edge around them are a dark brown, so they seem like they can be dressed up or down, which I appreciate for the winter!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Adorable booties, but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these last fall. I love the look, the height is perfect and they go with just about everything. The only bad thing I can say is that they are already coming apart at the heel. I thought Lucky Brand was a bit more high-quality. I dislike fast-fashion, therefore, I'm not sure I would buy again. As for now, I hope they last another season or two.
customer_reviews.author: T. ZeBarth

customer_reviews.title: Cute Animal Print Meats Classic Vintage Brand
customer_reviews.text: I already have this shoe in a couple of other colors, when I spotted this pair! I am a big fan of Lucky Brand shoes, boots, clothing, and accessories. I love these boots! I pair them with a denim skinny jean and stylish, simple tunic top for work in public education. They add a little punch to the overall look.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Griggs

customer_reviews.title: This is my second pair
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a pair of these thru Brad's Deals - Price was great, so I didn't mind guesstimating my size. Loved them so much - able to walk 2 miles in the morning in total comfort with these shoes on. I just had to buy this second pair even thought the price was higher. I love the way they look with leggings and jeans. I saddle-soaped mine for protection to keep them looking nicer longer.
customer_reviews.author: riki walsh

customer_reviews.title: Staple in my closet.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 7. Well made. My go to all day every day. So comfortable. I have worn these almost everyday to work as a hair stylist for the past few months and they aren’t getting damaged or worn and torn yet. So that’s exciting. Wanted to buy them at Macy’s but they were much more affordable on here. Love them, not too shiny more matte finish so I don’t feel like Santa Claus. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TheF’nLizardKing

customer_reviews.title: Disposable Boots
customer_reviews.text: The quality is fairly low. After wearing them for only a few months they were scuffed, discolored, and the thin coating on the heel scraped off revealing yellow underneath. Not worth thew price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Knock Off
customer_reviews.text: These have to be knock offs. I have these in another color from Nordstrom, and they are my favorite booties! The black ones I got from Amazon are much narrower and have no cushion inside, the top front lip also digs into my leg. I would recommend to buy these shoes at a reputable store.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Love my 2nd pair of Lucky booties!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my second pair of Lucky booties! The first pair are suede and a lighter color and size 10. They are holding up great and I've had them for 2 years. I wanted a smooth leather bootie and darker in color. Normally I wear a 10 to 10.5, ordered the 10 and they fit just right. So far the color is holding up and have not worn them out in the rain but will apply a water repellant.
customer_reviews.author: sheila d

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bootie!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They are exactly what I was looking for a in a flat brown bootie - the color I got said toffee, but it's a beautiful cognac color. I got a size 9 and when I first put them on, I thought they were a tiny bit snug. But after only one day of wearing them, they have stretched just enough and are so comfortable! They've also worn a little bit on the toe and heel, but it's almost perfectly distressed and I love it. You can't beat the Amazon price of $77 either. If you're on the fence on these, go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M.

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these! Honestly, my 2 year hunt for the right ankle boots finally paid off. The heel hight is perfect (tiny boost without being a high heel), the pewter color is unique yet versatile (though I might order other colors), and the size is perfect for me.....I am normally a 10.5 which is hard to find, and the 11 in this fits with a thin sock (suspect after breaking them in more a thick sock will be fine). More support than other booties; somehow puts a hop in my step:)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Fake and made of pleather.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed!!...these are not authentic and are made of pleather!! Waste of money! I was excited to purchase these boots in black as I have the camel colored pair I purchased from a department store. The inner lining started coming apart the 2nd time I wore them which is where and when I realized they were fake leather. It's a shame because the camel colored ones I have are my favorite and I was so excited to get another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They're truly THE most comfortable boots I’ve ever worn. They do scratch easily, so that shiny, new look doesn’t last more than the first wear but I didn’t want that look. I like a lived-in look, so they’re more casual.
customer_reviews.author: ElaineD

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The fit was true to size. The width is on the narrower side, which was great for me, but may not be good if you have wider feet. The shoe itself is well made super comfortable. I usually end up buying insoles for my boots, but there is enough cushion in these that there will be no need. Buying shoes online is always a gamble, but couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CA_shopper

customer_reviews.title: Size and waterproof ish: holding up well!
customer_reviews.text: I’m usually a 9.5-10 for shoes, but the 10 pinched the top of my feet too much, so I went with the size 11 pair. Super cute, not sure the quality is worth the price... but I got them quickly before a trip. Walked several days around Sydney in late summer, no blisters! There were warnings of waterproof issues in other reviews, so I rubbed them with leather rehydration/waterproofing goop and they have been working splendidly. Some unattractive creasing, but still holding up well through rain, light snow, 90 degrees Fahrenheit with high humidity, and about 20 miles of walking.
customer_reviews.author: K High

customer_reviews.title: Cute but scuffs easily
customer_reviews.text: Great bootie. It is a softer leather so It does scuff easily. I have 3 dogs and when they greet me they walk on my feet. Needless to say I have multiple nail marks on my booties. It doesn’t bother me too much since these are casual and I don’t think anyone is paying that close attention to my shoes. But they are comfortable and stylish. The brown color in the picture is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Krusty Krab

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Opened box, inspected and returned. Its leather but for farm work or riding this will not work. Quality is poor. Boot is held only by glue, heel is not solid. Already showed signs of detaching at sole. Would not make one week of everyday normal wear. Much too expensive for quality.
customer_reviews.author: loungelover

customer_reviews.title: I expected something nicer from Lucky Brand.
customer_reviews.text: The picture made the leather look more textured than it actually was. It was not as comfy as I expected either. There was something off about the support. It was not tight but it didnt feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: LBZ

customer_reviews.title: Blisters the size of golf balls
customer_reviews.text: I got my boots yesterday and was SO excited to wear them! I’m a photographer and wore them to a photo shoot last night. About half way through the shoot they really started to hurt, and by the time the shoot was over I have enormous blisters. Unfortunately because I wore them I can’t return them now and I’m stuck with boots I can’t wear. They definitely run small.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what the deal is with these shows but they are the cheapest most poorly made shoe I’ve ever seen. I wear looked like I’ve had them for a year. There is the cheap thin wood veneer on the heel which just stared peeling off immediately. Are these knock offs? I don’t know. I ordered these cause I sa them in a store and mine looked a lot cheaper. Super dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: L R

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 8. I very rarely have to select a different size, but this booty is way to small for my foot. May be partly due to the narrow toe, but still too small for comfort. It's a cute shoe, but when they arrived, one of the booties had to scratch marks on it, making it less attractive. So, I will be returning these unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: popeymom

customer_reviews.title: Really uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are dreadfully uncomfortable. I usually stick with quality name brands like Clark, Bourne, echo, ETC... I took a chance on these after reading all of the reviews. I tried for two days at home to break them in so they'd be more comfortable. Now I'm left with two choices: either give them away it try and find inserts that make them comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MrsTiffanyBaker

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, cute, get the Sno Seal.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable all day on feet right out of box. Have worn the black leather to work almost daily for months in Seattle rain and sleet, holding up well. I did the SnoSeal beeswax protector as suggested by another reviewer. I usually wear a 6.5 or 7 and 6.5 is perfect fit w still enough room for thin sock over tights.
customer_reviews.author: CieloS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boot but way too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I loved this boot! I had to return 2x as I could not get the boot to fit. I am a 7 1/2 normal foot and I ordered 7 1/2 which was way too tight. I then ordered a 7 wide thinking that would be better but still was too tight. I should of ordered an 8 wide but gave up. I suggest going up a size and ordering wide. If you have a wide foot these boots are not for you!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Too tight in the Toes.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the boot. It was cute, loved the zippers on both sides. However, it was quite tight around my toe area. The boot just "scrunched" in my entire toe area. I've never experienced that in a boot before. The only time I've felt this in a shoe, is when I wear a super pointy dress heel. Unfortunately, they are going back today. I usually wear an 8.5. Based on the reviews, I ordered an 8.5. I don't even want to take a chance that the 9's would be better. Off to something new.
customer_reviews.author: LuAnn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but noisy and not comfy
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the boot. The zippers make noise when I walk. My wide foot feels moderately squished across the ball of the foot. There is no cushion or arch support. I am looking for an every-day shoe, not a once-in-a-while shoe, so, unfortunately, I think I am going to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Hunter

customer_reviews.title: They made me feel a less boring fashion wise.
customer_reviews.text: This pair of shoes are exactly what I expected from Lucky Brand. They are handsome(attractive), well fitting and with quality construction. Being that they are Natural leather I advise purchasing some natural shoe wax to buff out scratches when they occur. These shoes elevate any top and jeans combo. Thanks Lucky
customer_reviews.author: A. In SoCal

customer_reviews.title: Nice look. bit large in the wide sizes
customer_reviews.text: Cool shoe. Love the look. Low heel. Great with jeans. Typically look for 7.5 to 8 Wide in shoes. Chose 8 Wide. Probably should have picked 7-7.5 Wide. I would say this is definitely more typical of an 8 - 8.5 Wide. A bit loose in width.. Was able to add inserts into my shoe with no issue. Can slip off the 8 Wide without unzipping side zipper. think it will improve with age. slit round toe - not sure I expected this.
customer_reviews.author: maryP

customer_reviews.title: So small!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a consistent standard size 10 in shoes so that’s what I ordered...wow are they small!! I could have ordered an 11 wide in this bootie (and I have narrow feet and high arches). I’m so sad because they are the perfect height and color. Back they go.
customer_reviews.author: catglasses12

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To Ankle Boot
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to ankle boot. Second pair Lucky boots. I absolutely love them. They wear beautifully, the suede ages and keeps looking cooler. Pairs perfectly with your best jeans; ankle or boot cut and even cut offs and an oversized sweater. ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T

customer_reviews.title: Scuffs easily, but super comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way these boots look and they are very comfortable, even on my feet all day. My only complaint is that by the end of the winter (admittedly, after some very regular and rough use) the toes and inside of the heels had peeled off. The boots were still passable with some black polish, though. That said, I've purchased a second pair for next fall/winter (:
customer_reviews.author: Colleen G.

customer_reviews.title: Color not right on first pair
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the sugar red in size 9.5. The boots fit true to size as I usually wear a 9.5 in most shoes and are cute. However, the three stars are for the color. I ordered the sugar red, which I consider to be a normal red suede in the picture. I received a pair that were more of a purple/plum color, that look like the dark red suede boots in the picture. They are being sent back and I have already ordered the toffee color. Hope it goes well. UPDATE: The toffee pair are perfect fit and color. Spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Do NOT waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the worst shoes I have ever had in my life. If they were free, I would still feel like I had gotten screwed bc the quality is so poor. I read that these shoes wear and tear quickly so I bought the snow protection oil and heated the shoes and then added the oil. I wore them for the first time today and they are already ruined — it looks like I have worn the shoes for years and worse, there is absolutely NO support. Do not waste your money — literally the worst shoes I’ve ever worn — my feet are killing me.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect description.
customer_reviews.text: Just an FYI... I ordered the grey chinchilla basel boots and received these snakeskin colored ones instead... I returned and reordered and again, snakeskin. I think the description is incorrect for this item. They r being returned again.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn White

customer_reviews.title: Great bootie!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit of the boot. I wear an 8 or 8.5. With this bootie I ordered an 8.5 and it fit great. I gave it 4 stars because the color is a little off from the picture. It looked to me as if the color was a cognac brown but it's not. It is more of a chocolate brown. They are still nice and I like them. I love the low heel.
customer_reviews.author: Moeh25

customer_reviews.title: They will stretch
customer_reviews.text: If you get your normal size and they seem tight, they will break in really quickly and become super comfortable. I thought they were too small and ordered a size up but that was too big. My only prob was that these were sold and shipped by Amazon yet my size was $25 more than 1/2 up. I sent a msg to CS but was told they don't price match to which I replied I understand for other vendors/shippers or if time has passed but this is all Amazon. The only response I got was sorry we can't offer additional insight. So 1 star for CS and 5 stars for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these boots several times. I find them incredibly comfortable, and very stylish. Highly recommend for style and price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly T.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my previous pair, which eventually broke down after 2 years of very frequent wear. I have somewhat wide feet. These shoes are somehow comfortable without making my feet look wide at all.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love this bootie! Cute and comfortable right out of the box. I wish I had purchased more than one pair. I ordered a 5.5 and they fit me comfortably, but I have narrow feet. If you run on the larger side of a half size, I would order up to the next full size.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rolfe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Boots
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality boots! They are so nice and look so rich when wearing them. They are true to size and are so comfortable. I highly recommend them. I don't think you will be disappointed. This is my 2nd pair.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I looked at these in Macys and they were more expensive and then I accidentally ordered them from amazon, I was surprised when they arrived, but I LOVE them. The fit is perfect, a little snug at first but the leather stretches a bit and they fit amazing! Couldn't recommend them more. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Gaaber

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: Love. So comfortable. The leather is sooo soft, great quality. Not too much of a heal & they don’t make a boot clunking sound when you walk. Super cute. A colleague noticed the first day I wore them, without knowing they were necessarily new. First time I ever wore new shoes all day and was still comfortable by the end of the day. Perfect for casual and work wear! So happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Wright

customer_reviews.title: Best booties ever!!
customer_reviews.text: The sugar red suede color is amazing! I’m so glad it doesn’t look like the picture. The picture looks more red/rust but they are like a burgundy/wine and absolutely perfect! Love these booties so much! This is my 2nd pair and although they are more than I normally spend on shoes, they are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm really sad about this
customer_reviews.text: I'm really sad about this. The shoes are so pretty and stylish. But the sizing is not very accurate. I got my usual size 8, it fits ok but the ball part of my feet felt so snug that I wore it around the house for an hour and it hurt a lot, so I sent it back. Now I have the 8.5 and it feels like more than a half size big! It's so loose. I don't know what to do, I really want to keep it but my feet are slipping forward. I also noticed how there are noticeable scuffs already on the shoes! I guess this is not for me I have to send this back! :(
customer_reviews.author: Star

product_meta.title: Lucky Brand Women's Basel Ankle Bootie
product_meta.description:
Bootie

Rooted in rock 'n' roll with a signature sense of humor, Lucky Brand stands for independent thinking, individual style and a feeling as authentic as love. Friends since youth, creators Gene Montesano and Barry Perlman shipped the first order of Lucky Brand in 1990, and have been renowned for their great-fitting jeans and vintage-inspired apparel and accessories ever since.
feature_bullets: Low, casual ankle boot with dual zippers at sides,Upper suede leather, synthetic lining, stacked heel and rubber outsole
